mapper.insert: insert into T_TRAIN(TRAIN_TITLE, TRAIN_CONTENT, S_ID, TRAIN_STARTIME, TRAIN_ENDTIME, TRAIN_PLACE) VALUES (#{trainTitle},#{TrainContent},#{sId},#{trainStatTime},#{trainEndTime},#{trainPlace})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_TRAIN SET TRAIN_TITLE=#{trainTitle}, TRAIN_CONTENT=#{TrainContent},S_ID=#{sId},TRAIN_STARTIME=#{trainStatTime},TRAIN_ENDTIME=#{trainEndTime}, TRAIN_PLACE=#{trainPlace} WHERE TRAIN_ID=#{trainId} and TRAIN_STATE=1
mapper.select: select * from T_TRAIN where S_ID=#{sId} and TRAIN_STATE=1
